LightningComponentBundle.description: Display a record collection as buttons. Clicking a button selects that record and navigates to the next flow screen. Works with any Salesforce object.

propertyType.name: T
propertyType.label: Object Type
propertyType.description: The Salesforce object type for the record collection

property.name: records
property.label: Records
property.description: Collection of records to display as buttons

property.name: displayFieldApiName
property.label: Display Field API Name
property.description: API name of the field to display as button text (e.g., Name, Subject, Title)

property.name: headerText
property.label: Header Text
property.description: Optional heading displayed above the buttons

property.name: subHeaderText
property.label: Sub-Header Text
property.description: Optional helper text displayed below the heading

property.name: buttonColor
property.label: Button Color
property.description: Hex color for button background (e.g., #0070d2). Defaults to Salesforce blue.

property.name: buttonTextColor
property.label: Button Text Color
property.description: Hex color for button text (e.g., #ffffff). Defaults to white.

property.name: selectedRecord
property.label: Selected Record
property.description: The full record of the button that was clicked

property.name: selectedRecordId
property.label: Selected Record ID
property.description: The record ID of the button that was clicked
